title: nI pOi azhaittu (padam)
sahitya:
nI pOi azhaittu vADi sakhiyE nIlamEgha shyAmaLanai ingu


anupallavi

  ninaindu ninaindu nenjam puNNAgudE nItiyillavenru nEriDai sholliyE


caraNam    nIrADum karai tanil nittamum vandenai nerungip-pEshiyadu ninaivu tAn illaiyO
 kaNamum piriyEn enru kai mel aDittadaik-kaNNaniDam sholli kaDugi varugavE
